name: Easy Polls
author: ifourtechnolab

sections.description:
Create Easy Polls in your site.
You can dynamic create Easy Polls inputs and it is configurable from admin side.
sections.installation:
1. Download plugin and unzip it to your /wp-content/plugins/ plugin directory.
  2. After that go to your plugin manager and activate it.
  3. After activate Easy Polls one configuration link is show in plugin manager and it is also show in admin menu.
  4. Go to Easy Polls and manage form inputs that are you want to display.
sections.faq:
1. Is this plugin Configure from Admin-side ?
    Yes.- Admin can configure this plugin form there control-panel
  2. Is it free ?
    Yes.- Easy Polls is free for all users.

Installation Instructions

  1. Download plugin and unzip it to your /wp-content/plugins/ plugin directory.
  2. After that go to your plugin manager and activate it.
  3. After activate Easy Polls one configuration link is show in plugin manager and it is also show in admin menu.
  4. Go to Easy Polls and manage form inputs that are you want to display.
